00017 com_ptr<IBundle> ConsoleCommand::getBundleFromParam(CConsoleBundle &console, const char *id)
00018 {
00019         com_ptr<IBundle> bndl;
00020         size_t pid;
00021 
00022         if(sscanf(id, "%ul", &pid) == 1)
00023                 bndl = console.getContext()->getBundle(pid);
00024 
00025         return bndl;
00026 }

00030 std::string ConsoleCommand::getStateName(EBundleState state)
00031 {
00032         char stateBuf[128];
00033         reflection::converter::to_string(reflection::make_typed_pair(state), stateBuf, 128);
00034         return stateBuf;
00035 }

00039 void CmdHelp::Execute(CConsoleBundle &console, const char **args, size_t nargs)
00040 {
00041         typedef CConsoleBundle::TCommands TCmds;
00042         TCmds& cmds = *console.getCommands();
00043 
00044         if(nargs == 0)
00045         {
00046                 for(TCmds::const_iterator it = cmds.begin(); it != cmds.end(); ++it)
00047                 {
00048                         std::cout << it->second->getName()
00049                                 << '\t' << it->second->getShortDescription()<<std::endl;
00050                 }
00051         }
00052         else
00053         {
00054                 TCmds::const_iterator it = cmds.find(args[0]);
00055                 if(it != cmds.end())
00056                         std::cout << it->second->getFullDescription() << std::endl;
00057                 else
00058                         std::cout << "no help associated with: " << args[0] << std::endl;
00059         }
00060 }

00064 void CmdStatus::Execute(CConsoleBundle &console, const char **args, size_t nargs)
00065 {
00066         if(!nargs)
00067         {
00068                 DynArrayImplOwned<com_ptr<IBundle> > bundles;
00069                 console.getContext()->getBundles(bundles);
00070 
00071                 std::cout<<"ID\tState\tBundle"<<std::endl;
00072 
00073                 for(size_t i = 0, size = bundles.size(); i != size; ++i)
00074                 {
00075                         IBundle* bndl = bundles[i];
00076                         std::cout<<bndl->getBundleId()<<'\t'<<getStateName(bndl->getState())<<'\t'<<bndl->getLocation()<<std::endl;
00077                 }
00078         }
00079         else
00080         {
00081                 com_ptr<IBundle> bndl = getBundleFromParam(console, args[0]);
00082 
00083                 if(!bndl)
00084                 {
00085                         std::cout<<"Invalid bundle ID/Name"<<std::endl;
00086                         return;
00087                 }
00088 
00089                 std::cout<< "ID: " << bndl->getBundleId() << std::endl
00090                         << "Name: " << "<unavailable>" << std::endl
00091                         << "Location: " << bndl->getLocation() << std::endl
00092                         << "State: " << getStateName(bndl->getState()) << std::endl;
00093         }
00094 }

00098 void CmdStart::Execute(CConsoleBundle &console, const char **args, size_t nargs)
00099 {
00100         if(nargs == 1)
00101         {
00102                 com_ptr<IBundle> bndl = getBundleFromParam(console, args[0]);
00103 
00104                 if(bndl)
00105                         bndl->Start();
00106                 else
00107                         std::cout<<"Invalid bundle ID/Name"<<std::endl;
00108         }
00109         else
00110         {
00111                 std::cout<<"Invalid number of parameters"<<std::endl;
00112         }
00113 }

00117 void CmdStop::Execute(CConsoleBundle &console, const char **args, size_t nargs)
00118 {
00119         if(nargs)
00120         {
00121                 com_ptr<IBundle> bndl = getBundleFromParam(console, args[0]);
00122 
00123                 if(bndl)
00124                 {
00125                         size_t id = bndl->getBundleId();
00126 
00127                         if(id == 0 || id == console.getContext()->getBundle()->getBundleId())
00128                         {
00129                                 console.Stop(0);
00130                                 console.getSystemBundle()->Stop();
00131                                 return;
00132                         }
00133                         else
00134                         {
00135                                 bndl->Stop();
00136                         }
00137                 }
00138                 else
00139                 {
00140                         std::cout<<"Invalid bundle ID/Name"<<std::endl;
00141                 }
00142         }
00143         else
00144         {
00145                 console.Stop(0);
00146                 console.getSystemBundle()->Stop();
00147         }
00148 }
